step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that stretch. Ensure your palm and fingers are open wide.
Excellent! You're making a fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale. Remember to keep that arm extended overhead.
Great job opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Visualize the fluid moving out of your arm.
You're doing well with the fist and inhale. Focus on keeping the arm fully extended overhead throughout the movement.
Second rep, looking good! Continue to stretch your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Keep your palm and fingers open wide.
Nice work making a fist and tightening muscles while inhaling. Ensure your arm remains extended overhead.
You're doing great opening your hand and relaxing on the exhale. Keep visualizing the lymph fluid moving.
Fantastic finish! You're making a fist and inhaling well. For next time, try to maintain that overhead arm extension even more consistently.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. Focus on making a tight fist while inhaling and opening your hand while exhaling to help move lymph fluid.
